channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why some see the dollar's drop as a sign America is losing its financial might
item.description: The dollar has just posted its worst first-half of a year since 1973. And now investors wonder — is it a sign that America is losing its financial sta...

item.title: 'The worst day of my life:' Texas' Hill Country reels as deaths rise due to floods
item.description: Dozens of people have died in the Texas Hill Country. Scores of others are missing or unaccounted for. As rescue crews continue to search for victims,...

item.title: Supreme Court Insists on Reams of Paper for Case Briefs in Digital Age
item.description: The court’s rules require many litigants to submit 40 copies of their briefs, resulting in millions of pages printed each term. Critics call the proce...

item.title: Inside the evolution of Biosphere 2, from '90s punchline to scientific playground
item.description: The venture, privately funded to start, is now run by the University of Arizona. And today, scientists there are quietly plugging away at research the...

item.title: The Agonizing Search in Texas, and a Looming Trade Deadline
item.description: Plus, what your TV knows about you.

item.title: Defunct oil wells are a national problem. Finding them is the first step
item.description: There could be about a million 'orphan' oil and gas wells across the U.S. As they age, they can leak greenhouse gases or unhealthy chemicals.

item.title: The war in Gaza divided a historic Brooklyn co-op. Here's what happened next
item.description: Since the war in Gaza began in October 2023, members of the Park Slope Food co-op have been debating whether to ban Israeli goods from the shelves.

item.title: Up Against Time, a Desperate Search Presses Ahead

item.title: Texas Hill Country Is Underwater, and America’s Emergency Lifeline Is Fraying
item.description: With each passing day, the federal government is becoming less prepared to face the next big disaster.

item.title: Ukraine Turns to Fishing Nets to Catch Russian Drones

item.title: 2 Dead and 500 Injured After Typhoon Danas Strikes Taiwan
item.description: Most typhoons come ashore on the island’s sparsely populated east coast, but Danas scraped its crowded western edge. Nearly 300,000 households had no ...

item.title: Indonesia Volcano Eruption Sends Ash Soaring 11 Miles High
item.description: The ash cloud above Mount Lewotobi Laki-laki on Monday was about four times taller than the one produced by an eruption there last month.

item.title: Trump Keeps Foreign Countries on Edge as Tariff Deadline Nears
item.description: The president is again threatening higher tariff rates on a dozen foreign nations, as a deadline elapses this week for making trade deals.
